name: Bullet Hell (MulticoloredLion14)
description:
This is my bullet hell game!!! I hope you like it!!! In this game you will be a potato firing bullets at enemies. 

Controls: WASD

Left-click to shoot

You have to click on the game to start moving.

Email me with a screenshot of the game after you kill all enemies, to prove that my game isn't too hard.

Email: alerod3857@student.ccs.k12.nc.us

The point of the game is to be beat in 10 seconds or less.

Click Space to restart.
